name: bartop
description: Web framework for hobbyist and freelance bartenders

scripts.install: npm run install-bartop-ui && npm run install-bartop-api
scripts.start: echo 'To run the full application, execute `npm run bartop-api` and `npm run bartop-ui` in two separate processes.'
scripts.test: npm run test-bartop-api && npm run test-bartop-ui
scripts.test-all: npm run test-bartop-api-integration && npm run test-bartop-ui-ci
scripts.lint: npm run lint-bartop-api && npm run lint-bartop-ui
scripts.lint-bartop-ui: cd bartop-ui && npm run lint && npm run lint:css

author: Dustin Popp
